Huxtable is a package for creating HTML and LaTeX tables. It provides similar 
functionality to xtable, but does more, with a simpler interface. 

# Installing

To install from github: 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github('hughjonesd/huxtable')
```

# Learning more

Check out [the website](http://hughjonesd.github.io/huxtable), or read the vignette in
[HTML](http://hughjonesd.github.io/huxtable/introduction-to-huxtable.html) or [PDF](http://hughjonesd.github.io/huxtable/introduction-to-huxtable.pdf).
